QuestData.Title: Don't Stop Bereavin'
QuestData.Description: For a moment, I thought my hatred had stilled. My wife laid to rest, a final offering of the blood of her murderers to quell her tortured spirit. I thought perhaps peace would appeal to me.$B$BI was wrong.$B$BI will not rest now until every single filthy, squealing, murderous quilboar lays dead and broken! I cannot kill them fast enough with my own two hands. Go and slay more for me, $r.
QuestData.CompletionText: More! Kill more of them! MORE!
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Take your reward; this is only a prelude.
